automation_yaml:
id: 'living_room_light_off_2300'
alias: Living Room Light Off at 11 PM
description: "Turn off the Living Room Light every night at 11:00 PM"
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: time
    at: '23:00:00'
conditions: []
action:
  - service: light.turn_off
    target:
      entity_id: light.living_room_2
